deploymentReadyOption.description: Information about the action to take when newly provisioned instances are ready to receive traffic in a blue/green deployment (documented below).

greenFleetProvisioningOption.description: Information about how instances are provisioned for a replacement environment in a blue/green deployment (documented below).

terminateBlueInstancesOnDeploymentSucces.description:
Information about whether to terminate instances in the original fleet during a blue/green deployment (documented below).

_Only one `blue_green_deployment_config` is allowed_.
